channel.title: Abouts on NobleSummit
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on NobleSummit

item.description: About Me Koji Nomiyama is a software architect, an Istio Member and an ONAP PTL. He has a solid experience in the information and telecommunication technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country software systems, most of them are still running in production. He loves open source and has been contributing to various open source projects, he is a member of Istio, previous PTL of ONAP, the author of the Hugo clean-white theme and the open source project Aeraki Mesh.

About Me Koji Nomiyama is a software architect, an Istio Member and an ONAP PTL. He has a solid experience in the information and telecommunication technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country software systems, most of them are still running in production. He loves open source and has been contributing to various open source projects, he is a member of Istio, previous PTL of ONAP, the author of the Hugo clean-white theme and the open source project Aeraki Mesh.
